message:
Dear {{doc.employee_name}},

We hope you're doing well. As part of our offboarding process, we kindly request you to complete the Exit Interview Questionnaire.

Your feedback is extremely valuable to us and will help improve the experience for future team members.

Please take a few moments to share your thoughts by filling out the questionnaire at your earliest convenience.

Thank you once again for being a part of {{ doc.company }}. We appreciate your time and insights.

Warm regards,

{{ doc.company }}
name: Exit Questionnaire Mail To Employee
subject: We’d Appreciate Your Response – Exit Interview Questionnaire
